Plot: Two South Africans set out to discover what happened to their unlikely musical hero, the mysterious 1970s rock n roller, Rodriguez.
Title: Searching for Sugar Man
Writer: Malik Bendjelloul, Stephen 'Sugar' Segerman (article), Craig Bartholomew Strydom (article)
Actors: Stephen 'Sugar' Segerman, Dennis Coffey, Mike Theodore, Dan DiMaggio
tomatoConsensus: A fascinating portrait of a forgotten musical pioneer, Searching for Sugar Man is by turns informative and mysterious.
